item.title: Flowing from Words to Pixels: A Framework for Cross-Modality Evolution
item.description: CrossFlow: Directly evolve any modality to another using flow matching, achieving state-of-the-art results across various tasks!

item.title: Apollo: An Exploration of Video Understanding in Large Multimodal Models
item.description: Apollo LMMs achieve SOTA on video understanding tasks by exploring and optimizing the design and training of video-LMMs.
